org.anarres.linguistics.core

Class Base

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.anarres.linguistics.core.Base
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Conjugator, Pluralizer

    public abstract class Base
extends Object
    The base class of all linguistics handlers.

      Locale getLocale()

      Returns 'word' with the last 'trim' characters removed.

      Returns the last 'length' characters of 'word'.
